name: Seven Chakra Stones (twister57)
description:
The Seven Chakra Stones - Death is only the beginning

Seven Chakra Stones was created for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam. Trying to learn C# programming through the GameDev.tv course. First time doing a jam, first time putting the courses I have done together. Still have a long way to go.

Collect all seven Chakra Stones and stop the cycle of “Death and Rebirth”. Death is only the beginning.

WSAD or Arrows keys for movement. Avoid moving objects, will restart the level
